WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

      When i get DataSet using AsDataSet method the work sheet name is not captured
completely in the TableName.File type is 2003 xls.

For example i get  "I\0n\0v\0e\0s\0t\0m\0e\0"
for sheet  name Investment Grade. 

Is there any work around for getting the full worksheet name ?
WorkItem.Summary: worksheet name is not captured in DataSet

Comments.Message: Looks kind of like a unicode problem?
I agree looks like a unicode issue. can you upload an example spreadsheet?
